name: Football Rising Star
description:
Brand new football game. Less stress, more joy!

Football Rising Star differs from the traditional football games which need a lot of intensive competitive operations and collecting stars, we redefine the football game with its original meanings.


In the game, you would be a 15-year-old boy who just started his professional football career. After hard training and several matches, your skills improve, and you become a superstar instead of a noob.
In the game, players could decide what skills to improve and what strategies to use based on their own judgments and let all these decisions work right away in the following matches.


Features:
Less Stress – No real-time operations, and strategies matter the most.
Smart Training – Decide what skills to improve.
Fast Pace - Achieve Season Goals easily.
Five Leagues –Play in the top league and compete with top clubs.
Fancy Awards – Try to win all 12 Professional Awards.
